name: Terminal Reset
description:
They hold you captive.

All your implants, all your artificial limbs - disabled.

You have nothing left, and have decided to take it all back.

-TERMINAL RESET-

Controls:

Shooter: WASD to move around, mouse to aim, click to shoot (hold to autoshoot)

Platformer: AD to move, W to jump, Shift to dash.

Team:
-Essence: art, animation, design
-LomDom: art, animation
-Fusionnist: programming, music, art, design
